Description: State-derived id. Generally alphabetical, with exceptions for name changes.

Source: https://www.mass.gov/info-details/massgis-data-regional-planning-agencies, with OCPC/MAPC munis entered into a single MPO

Description: Regional Transportation Authroties: Municpalities that are part of no RTA and are in the MBTA service area are noted differently than municipalities that are not member of any transit-providing agency.
MBTA Core Municipalities: 14 and 51 community definitions from MGL161A and other named communities, plus additions over time.
Community categories from the Multifamily Zoning Law
